hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: weights.csv
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: EXAMPLE: concept_node.DISPLAY,3 concept_node.CONCEPT_PATH,2 dataset.FULL_NAME,1 dataset.DESCRIPTION,1 concept_node_meta_str,1

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# These are bash commands, so use the internal location of the config volume mkdir -p /usr/local/docker-config/dictionary-weights/ cp /usr/local/docker-config/dictionary/.env /usr/local/docker-config/dictionary-weights/ cp weights.csv /usr/local/docker-config/dictionary-weights/weights.csv
cd dictionaryweights # These are docker commands, so now we use the external location of the config volume docker build . -t dictionary-weights docker run --rm --env-file=/usr/local/docker-config/dictionary-weights/.env --network dictionary_dictionary -v $DOCKER_CONFIG_DIR/dictionary-weights/weights.csv:/weights.csv dictionary-weights
